mdRecord.dcterms:title: Etats-Unis: Fac simile de quelques signatures de l'acte d'Indepéndance
Etats Unis
Fac simile de quelques signatures de l'acte d'Indépendance
Facsimile de quelques signatures de l'acte d'Indépendance
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Albert H. Small Declaration of Independence Collection (University of Virginia)
mdRecord.dcterms:extent: Presumably a plate which has been removed from a book.
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Includes facsimile signatures of 12 signers of the Declaration, including John Hancock, Th. Jefferson, Benja. Franklin and John Adams.
SPECIAL COLLECTIONS: Albert H. Small Declaration of Independence Collection. Deposit of Albert H. Small, July 14, 2003.
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: United States.--Declaration of Independence--Signers.
